name: Aslanbek
about_text: Hi! My name is Aslanbek. I create user-friendly and dynamic websites with a strong focus on usability and interaction. In my daily work, I use
about_text1: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next Js, Tailwind CSS
about_text2: always paying attention to how websites look and feel across different devices.
about_text3: I enjoy building visually appealing, fast, and efficient interfaces. Collaboration, working on new ideas, and continuously improving my skills are important to me. Beyond coding, I follow
about_text5: trends, experiment with design, and enjoy learning new web technologies.
about_text6: Let’s work together to create digital experiences that users will remember.
